text: “Nɨ akar kam isɨ Aron uan otariba ko Israelian gumazamizibav mɨkemegh. Ia Israelian gumazitam, o ikɨzir igharazibar gumazamizir Israelɨn kantrin ititam, an asɨzir tam isɨ ofan bar isia mɨghɨrim bagh an aku izam, kar ofan a uan akar dɨkɨrɨzim na ko amizim akɨrasa, o a uan ifongiamɨn gɨn ghua ofa damuasa,
